snippet: The app, which has maps that point the way to hidden entry gates, escalates the war between homeowners and a less-privileged public that wants to share the California coastline.
abstract: Battle between Malibu, Calif, beachfront homeowners and less privileged public that wants to share stunning coastline has been ongoing; now, smartphone app designed by environmental writer Jenny Price identifies counterfeit 'Keep Out' signs and hidden gates to public beaches, causing homeowners to worry that it will draw crowds to their secluded world.
lead_paragraph: The app, which has maps that point the way to hidden entry gates, escalates the war between homeowners and a less-privileged public that wants to share the California coastline.

headline.main: In Battle Over Malibu Beaches, an App Unlocks Access
headline.print_headline: An App Shows the Gaps in Malibu’s Beachfront Wall
